short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Go to the top of the page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scroll To Top extension with one click you will be at the top of the page with beautiful animation. No more searching for Home key on your keyboard and no more dragging of the scroll bar. It will be just fun and ergonomic to use it.
